00020 #include "UWBIRStochasticPathlossModel.h"
00021 
00022 #include "BaseWorldUtility.h"
00023 #include "AirFrame_m.h"
00024 
00025 //const double UWBIRStochasticPathlossModel::Gtx = 0.9, UWBIRStochasticPathlossModel::Grx = 0.9, UWBIRStochasticPathlossModel::ntx = 0.9, UWBIRStochasticPathlossModel::nrx = 0.9;
00026 const double UWBIRStochasticPathlossModel::Gtx = 1, UWBIRStochasticPathlossModel::Grx = 1, UWBIRStochasticPathlossModel::ntx = 1, UWBIRStochasticPathlossModel::nrx = 1;
00027 const double UWBIRStochasticPathlossModel::fc = 4492.8; // mandatory band 3, center frequency, MHz
00028 const double UWBIRStochasticPathlossModel::d0 = 1;
00029 
00030 const double UWBIRStochasticPathlossModel::s_mu = 1.6, UWBIRStochasticPathlossModel::s_sigma = 0.5;
00031 const double UWBIRStochasticPathlossModel::kappa = 1;
00032 
00033 double UWBIRStochasticPathlossModel::n1_limit = 1.25;
00034 double UWBIRStochasticPathlossModel::n2_limit = 2;
00035 
00036 double UWBIRStochasticPathlossModel::simtruncnormal(double mean, double stddev, double a, int /*rng*/) {
00037     double res = a + 1;
00038     while(res > a || res < -a) {
00039       res = normal(mean, stddev, 0);
00040     }
00041     return res;
00042 }
00043 
00044 void UWBIRStochasticPathlossModel::filterSignal(AirFrame *frame, const Coord& sendersPos, const Coord& receiverPos)
00045 {
00046   if (isEnabled) {
00047     Signal& signal = frame->getSignal();
00048     // Initialize objects and variables
00049     TimeMapping<Linear>* attMapping = new TimeMapping<Linear> ();
00050     Argument arg;
00051 
00052     // Generate channel.
00053     // assume channel coherence during whole frame
00054 
00055     n1 = simtruncnormal(0, 1, n1_limit, 1);
00056     n2 = simtruncnormal(0, 1, n2_limit, 2);
00057     n3 = simtruncnormal(0, 1, n2_limit, 3);
00058 
00059     gamma = mu_gamma + n1 * sigma_gamma;
00060     sigma = mu_sigma + n3 * sigma_sigma;
00061     S = n2 * sigma;
00062 
00063     // Determine distance between sender and receiver
00064     double distance    = receiverPos.distance(sendersPos);
00065     /*
00066      srcPosX.record(senderPos.x);
00067      srcPosY.record(senderPos.y);
00068      dstPosX.record(receiverPos.x);
00069      dstPosY.record(receiverPos.y);
00070      distances.record(distance);
00071      */
00072     // Compute pathloss
00073     double attenuation = getGhassemzadehPathloss(distance);
00074     pathlosses.record(attenuation);
00075     //attenuation = attenuation / (4*PI*pow(distance, gamma));
00076     // Store scalar mapping
00077     attMapping->setValue(arg, attenuation);
00078     signal.addAttenuation(attMapping);
00079   }
00080 }
00081 
00082 double UWBIRStochasticPathlossModel::getNarrowBandFreeSpacePathloss(double fc, double distance) {
00083     const double attenuation = 4*M_PI*distance*fc/BaseWorldUtility::speedOfLight;
00084     return 1.0/(attenuation*attenuation);
00085 }
00086 
00087 double UWBIRStochasticPathlossModel::getGhassemzadehPathloss(double distance) const {
00088     double attenuation = PL0;
00089     if(distance < d0) {
00090       distance = d0;
00091     }
00092     attenuation = attenuation - 10*gamma*log10(distance/d0);
00093     if (shadowing) {
00094       attenuation = attenuation - S;
00095     }
00096     attenuation = pow(10, attenuation/10); // from dB to mW
00097     return attenuation;
00098 }
00099 
00100 double UWBIRStochasticPathlossModel::getFDPathloss(double freq, double distance) const {
00101     return 0.5*PL0*ntx*nrx*pow(freq/fc, -2*(kappa+1))/pow(distance/d0, pathloss_exponent);
00102 }
